div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1117 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1946 Burial: late 3rd-early 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 7 AE. In one room in upper town Olbia: (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 26-29 [2]; pl. 10, 5 [1], 14 [1]; unc. [3]) Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
